solution_line_template: The total rain was {monday_morning_rain} inches + {monday_later_rain} inches = <<{monday_morning_rain}+{monday_later_rain}={monday_total}>>{monday_total} inches on Monday.
The total rain was {tuesday_multiplier} * {monday_total} inches = <<{tuesday_multiplier}*{monday_total}={tuesday_total}>>{tuesday_total} inches on Tuesday.
The total rain was {wednesday_rain} inches + {thursday_rain} inch = <<{wednesday_rain}+{thursday_rain}={wed_thu_total}>>{wed_thu_total} inch across Wednesday and Thursday.
The total rain was {monday_total} inches + {tuesday_total} inches + {wed_thu_total} inch = <<{monday_total}+{tuesday_total}+{wed_thu_total}={friday_total}>>{friday_total} inches on Friday.

There were {monday_total} inches + {tuesday_total} inches + {wed_thu_total} inch + {friday_total} inches = <<{monday_total}+{tuesday_total}+{wed_thu_total}+{friday_total}={week_total}>>{week_total} inches total last week.
{week_total} inches/{days} days = <<{week_total}/{days}={average_daily_rain}>>{average_daily_rain} inches average daily rain.
